summary.span: 代表呈現項目集合的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種可以包含多個項目，例如字串、 物件或其他項目。An is a type of that can contain multiple items, such as strings, objects, or other elements. 下圖顯示控制項，其中包含下列不同類型的項目：The following illustration shows a control that contains the following different types of items: - 字串。A string. - 物件。A object. - 物件。A object. - A包含控制項和。A control that contains an and a . ![以四種類型的內容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "四種類型的內容與清單方塊")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 包含多種物件類型的 ListBoxListBox that contains multiple types of objects 使用或屬性來指定要用於產生之內容的集合您。Use either the or the property to specify the collection to use to generate the content of your . 您可以設定實作的任何類型的屬性。You can set the property to any type that implements . 通常用來顯示資料集合，或繫結集合物件。 is typically used to display a data collection or to bind an to a collection object. 如果您不想使用該物件會實作填入，您可以加入項目使用屬性。If you do not want to use an object that implements to populate the , you can add items by using the property. 中的項目可以具有不同的類型。The items in an can have different types. 例如，可包含是字串的一個項目與另一個項目是。For example, a can contain one item that is a string and another item that is an . 當設定屬性，則集合設為唯讀和固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is set to read-only and fixed-size. 這表示，您無法將項目加入集合直接。This means that you cannot add items to the collection directly. 當正在使用中，將屬性設定為`null`移除集合，並還原使用量，它將會是空。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . 每個類型都有對應的項目容器類型。Each type has a corresponding item container type. 每個對應的項目容器附加`Item`為其名稱。The corresponding item container for each appends `Item` to its name. 例如，對於，項目容器是控制項，如，它們是控制項。For example, for , the item containers are controls; for , they are controls. 您可以明確建立每個項目中的容器類型，但不需要。You can explicitly create a container type for each item in the , but it is not necessary. 當未明確建立的容器類型時，其中一個會產生包含項目集合中的資料項目。When you do not explicitly create the container type, one is generated that contains a data item in the item collection. 比方說，如果您將繫結到字串物件的集合屬性，您無法明確建立物件，但產生另一個用於每個字串。For example, if you bind a collection of string objects to the property of a , you do not explicitly create objects, but the will generate one for each string. 您可以使用來存取產生的項目容器屬性。You can access a generated item container by using the property. > [!NOTE] > UI 自動化的某些功能無法正常運作時包含重複的物件。Certain features of UI Automation do not work correctly when an contains duplicate objects. 如果物件出現多次時，第一個執行個體會出現在自動化樹狀目錄中。If an object appears multiple times, only the first instance appears in the automation tree. (兩個物件**x**和**y**會被視為重複項目如果`Object.Equals(x, y)`傳回`true`。)(Two objects **x** and **y** are considered to be duplicates if `Object.Equals(x, y)` returns `true`.) > > 雖然物件**x**正在使用所傳回的值**x。**`GetHashCode()`While an object **x** is in use by an the value returned by **x.**`GetHashCode()` 必須不會變更。must not change. 變更此值是不受支援，並且會導致無法預期的行為。Changes to this value are unsupported, and lead to unpredictable behavior. 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例將示範資料繫結至。The following examples demonstrate binding data to an . 第一個範例會建立一種類別稱為`MyData`也就是簡單的字串集合。The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection. [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#8)] 下列範例會繫結物件至`MyData`。The following example binds the object of an to `MyData`. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#7)] [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#6)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#9)] 下圖顯示前一個範例中所建立的控制項。The following illustration shows the control created in the previous example. ![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox")![ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox1.PNG "ListBox") 下列範例示範如何以填入使用屬性。The following example demonstrates how to populate an by using the property. 此範例會將下列不同類型的項目:The example adds the following different types of items to the : - 字串。A string. - 物件。A object. - 物件。A object. - A包含其他控制項物件。A control that contains other objects. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)] 下圖顯示前一個範例中所建立。The following illustration shows the created in the previous example. ![以四種類型的內容的 ListBox](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "四種類型的內容與清單方塊")![ListBox with four types of content](~/add/media/controlcontentmodellistbox2.PNG "ListBox with four types of content") 下列範例說明如何使用不同的樣式和樣板化相關的屬性所提供的。The following example illustrates how to use the different styling and templating-related properties that are provided by the . 在此範例中會繫結的集合`Task`物件。The in this example is bound to a collection of `Task` objects. 為方便示範，這個範例中的樣式和範本都是內嵌宣告的。For demonstration purposes, the styles and templates in this example are all declared inline. [!code-xaml[DataTemplatingIntro_snip#ItemsControlProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTemplatingIntro_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#itemscontrolproperties)] 下圖呈現時的範例螢幕擷取畫面。The following illustration is a screenshot of the example when it is rendered. ![ItemsControl 範例螢幕擷取畫面](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl 範例螢幕擷取畫面")![ItemsControl example screenshot](~/add/media/databinding-itemscontrolproperties.png "ItemsControl example screenshot") 兩個其他樣式相關屬性的，不會顯示如下和。Two other style-related properties of the that are not shown here are and .

span.span: The number of alternating item containers in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性可讓您指定兩個或多個替代項目容器的外觀。The and properties enable you to specify the appearance for two or more alternating item containers. 例如，您可以指定替代的背景色彩，每個第三個項目中。For example, you can specify alternating background colors for every third item in an . 指派給每個項目容器。The is assigned to each item container in the . 從 0 開始，直到遞增減 1 和 0 然後重新啟動。 begins at 0, increments until it is minus 1, and then restarts at 0. 例如，如果為 3，7 中的項目下, 表列出每個項目。For example, if is 3 and there are seven items in the , the following table lists the for each item. |中的項目位置 Position of Item in the || |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |11|00| |22|11| |33|22| |44|00| |55|11| |66|22| |77|00| 有幾種的方法可用來指定不同的替代項目容器的外觀。There are several methods you can use to specify different appearances for the alternating item containers. 一種方法是將繫結屬性的項目容器。One method is to bind properties of the items container to the . 然後您可以使用來指定哪個值應該套用到具有特定的項目容器值。You can then use an to specify which value should be applied to the item container that has a certain value. 您也可以使用觸發程序來變更項目容器的屬性的值而定的值及其。You can also use triggers to change the value of an item container's property depending on the value of its . ## Examples 下列範例會指定(繼承自) 具有替代項目容器 (類型)，並指定不同的背景和前景，針對每個。The following example specifies that the (which inherits from ) has alternating item containers (which are of type ) and specifies a different background and foreground for each one. 此範例會將繫結和屬性，並提供每一個屬性。The example binds the and properties to the and provides an for each property. [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] 下列範例會執行相同的上一個範例使用物件。The following example does the same as the previous example by using objects. [!code-xaml[AlternationIndexSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AlternationIndexSnippets/CS/Window1.xaml#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是簡單的方式來定義描述如何顯示資料物件的預設範本。This property is a simple way to define a default template that describes how to display the data objects. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 在下列範例中，靜態資源名為`places`做為集合定義`Place`中每個物件，`Place`物件具有`CityName`屬性和`State`屬性。In the following example, the static resource named `places` is defined as a collection of `Place` objects, in which each `Place` object has a `CityName` property and a `State` property. 前置詞`src`對應至命名空間所在的資料來源`Places`定義。The prefix `src` is mapped to the namespace where the data source `Places` is defined. 前置詞`scm`和`dat`對應至和命名空間，分別。The prefixes `scm` and `dat` are mapped to the and namespaces, respectively. 下列範例會建立一個檢視是依城市名稱排序，並依狀態分組的資料集合。The following example creates a view of the data collection that is sorted by the city name and grouped by the state. [!code-xaml[CollectionViewSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CollectionViewSource/CS/window1.xaml#1)] 檢視可以繫結來源，如下列範例所示。The view can be a binding source, as in the following example. 因為指定，每個`Place`物件會以顯示其`CityName`值。Because of the specified , each`Place` object is shown with its `CityName` value. 如果未指定，而且沒有任何，然後在基礎的集合 （在此情況下，「 SDKSample.Place"） 中顯示每個物件的字串表示。If is not specified and there is no , then the displays a string representation of each object in the underlying collection (in this case, "SDKSample.Place"). [!code-xaml[CollectionViewSource#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CollectionViewSource/CS/window1.xaml#2)]

summary.span: 取得 物件的集合，這些物件定義群組每個層級的外觀。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that define the appearance of each level of groups.

value.span: 物件的集合，這些物件定義群組每個層級的外觀。

span.span: A collection of objects that define the appearance of each level of groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引 0 處之項目的描述最上層群組，位於索引 1 的項目描述下一個層級，依此類推。The entry at index 0 describes the top-level groups, the entry at index 1 describes the next level, and so on. 如果有更多的層級的群組集合中的項目比，最後一個項目會使用額外的層級。If there are more levels of grouping than entries in the collection, the last entry is used for the extra levels. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreGroupStyleObjects**OneOrMoreGroupStyleObjects* 一或多個物件。One or more objects. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示繫結至和程式碼後置內容包含邏輯，可加入和移除群組。The following examples show an that is bound to an and the code-behind content that contains the logic to add and remove grouping. 當核取方塊、 內容分組依據`Type`屬性。When the check box is checked, the content of the is grouped by the `Type` attribute. 每個群組是類型。Each group is of type . 指定，如此它會顯示為顯示每個群組。The is specified so that it appears as a that displays the of each the group. 在此情況下，是`Work`或`Home`。In this case, the is either `Work` or `Home`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`、屬性會指定是否案例會決定是否要在選取項目。When the property is set to `true`, the property specifies whether the case determines whether an item is selected in an . 例如，如果包含兩個只有大小寫不同，例如"ITEM"和"item"，第一個字串一律會選取，不區分大小寫的輸入的字串。For example, if an contain two strings that differ only in case, such as "ITEM" and "item", the first string will always be selected, regardless of the case of the input. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含字串、"DOG"、"數據機"、"dog"和"cat"。The following example creates a that contains the strings, "DOG", "CAT", "dog", and "cat". 此範例會將繫結屬性屬性。The example binds the property to the property of a . 如果已經選取該核取方塊，且使用者"dog"，輸入中的第三個項目已選取。If the check box is selected and the user types "dog", the third item in the is selected. 如果使用者取消選取核取方塊和型別的"dog"，因為案例不是搜尋的條件，會選取第一個項目。If the user unselects the check box and types "dog", the first item is selected because case is not a condition of the search. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將屬性，每個項目容器取得，具有相同的物件當做，但屬性，例如描述之繫結中，資料和，是特定資料的每個項目。When you set the property, each item container gets a that has the same objects as the , but the properties that describe the data in the bindings, such as and , are specific to the data for each item in the . 您必須存取項目容器的執行作業例如驗證資料，並檢查是否有錯誤的項目。You must access the item container's to perform operations such as validate the data and check for errors on an item. ## Examples 下列範例會提示使用者輸入多個客戶，並將銷售人員指派給每個客戶的應用程式的一部分，然後檢查 銷售人員和客戶屬於相同的區域。The following example is part of an application that prompts the user to enter multiple customers and assign a sales representative to each customer, and then checks that the sales representative and the customer belong to the same region. 範例會設定的所以， `AreasMatch`，將會驗證每個項目。The example sets the of the so the , `AreasMatch`, will validate each item. 此範例也會建立顯示驗證錯誤。The example also creates a that displays validation errors. 請注意，的繫結至它從取得屬性。Notice that the of the is bound to a that it gets from the property. 值是發生錯誤的項目容器。The value of is the item container that has the error. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是負責產生[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]對於其主控件，例如。An is responsible for generating the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] for its host, such as an . 它會維護資料的檢視控制項中的項目與對應的關聯物件。It maintains the association between the items in the data view of the control and the corresponding objects. 每個具有相關聯的項目容器，其中包含項目集合中的資料項目。Every has an associated item container that contains a data item in the item collection. 您可以使用屬性相關聯的項目容器的存取您。You can use the property to access the item container that is associated with your . 例如，如果您有資料繫結控制項，而且您想要取得根據索引或其相關聯的資料的項目，您可以使用或方法。For example, if you have a data-bound control and you want to get a based on its index or its associated data item, you can use the or the method. 或者，您可以使用或方法來取得與指定產生之容器項目相關聯的資料或索引項目。Alternatively, you can use the or the method to get the index or data item that is associated with a given generated container element. 介面也用在進階案例中。The interface is also used in advanced scenarios. 一般而言，有自己的虛擬化的面板實作的進階應用程式呼叫介面的成員。Typically, advanced applications that have their own implementation of a virtualizing panel call members of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可能用來將項目加入。This property may be used to add items to an . 新增的子系物件隱含地將它加入至如物件。Adding a child to an object implicitly adds it to the for the object. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只能在設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]集合語法所示，透過或存取的集合物件，例如使用的各種方法`Add`。This property can only be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] via the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as `Add`. 用來存取集合物件本身屬性是唯讀的且集合本身讀寫。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only, and the collection itself is read-write. 請注意，您使用或屬性來指定應該用來產生的內容集合您。Note that you use either the or the property to specify the collection that should be used to generate the content of your . 當設定屬性，則集合由唯讀和固定大小。When the property is set, the collection is made read-only and fixed-size. 當正在使用中，設定屬性`null`移除集合，並還原使用量對，它將會是空。When is in use, setting the property to `null` removes the collection and restores usage to , which will be an empty . ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *OneOrMoreElements**OneOrMoreElements* 一或多個物件。One or more objects. ## Examples 下列範例將示範資料繫結至。The following examples demonstrate binding data to an . 第一個範例會建立一種類別稱為`MyData`也就是簡單的字串集合。The first example creates a class called `MyData` that is a simple string collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用來指定資料物件的視覺效果。You use the to specify the visualization of the data objects. 如果您繫結至集合物件，而且您未提供使用的特定顯示指示，產生[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的每個項目為基礎的集合中每個物件的字串表示。If your is bound to a collection object and you do not provide specific display instructions using a , the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of each item is a string representation of each object in the underlying collection. 當您將上、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]便會產生如下 (使用做為範例):When you set an on an , the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] is generated as follows (using the as an example): 1. 內容在產生期間，起始的要求建立每個資料項目的容器。During content generation, the initiates a request for the to create a container for each data item. 如，容器是。For , the container is a . 產生器會呼叫回準備容器。The generator calls back into the to prepare the container. 2. 組件的準備工作包括將複製的是的。Part of the preparation involves the copying of the of the to be the of the . 3. 類似所有型別，的包含。Similar to all types, the of a contains a . 套用範本時，它會建立其繫結至的。When the template is applied, it creates a whose is bound to the of the . 4. 最後，套用，本身，並可建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Finally, the applies that to itself, and that creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 如果您有一個以上的定義，而且您想要提供以程式設計方式選擇，並套用邏輯，使用屬性。If you have more than one defined and you want to supply logic to programmatically choose and apply a , use the property. 視覺自訂提供很大的彈性並提供許多設定樣式和範本的屬性。The provides great flexibility for visual customization and provides many styling and templating properties. 使用屬性或屬性設定會影響包含資料的項目之項目的外觀樣式。Use the property or the property to set a style to affect the appearance of the elements that contain the data items. 例如，對於，產生的容器是控制項，如，它們是控制項。For example, for , the generated containers are controls;
